assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The Medical Ethical Committee of the Amsterdam University Medical Center, location AMC, in Amsterdam assessed the study protocol and confirmed that the study was exempt from ethics review according to the Medical Research Involving Human Subjects Act.
